name: Geomotiv
tagline: Custom software development company in AdTech
description:
As a company we started in 2010, and picked up the most innovative segments.
Back then we were looking for a niche that would allow us to leverage our experience in building scalable, cutting edge and high load applications. So listed below domains were a natural choice:
Ad Tech, Martech, OTT, CTV, Linear TV, Big Data, Programmatic, DSP, SSP, RTB 2.0+, DMP, Machine learning and AI. 
Currently we are have more than 50 engineers on our's board and we are proud to admit that every engineer, manager or even data scientist have more than 9+ years of experience in the undustry. Geomotiv is all about "Get It Done!"
Our main services: 
Full-cycle product Enablement and Development
Web and mobile application development
Data Intellegence
Big Data
UI\UX and Design
Outstaffing and Dedicated development teams
​Drop us a note at: info@geomotiv.com
